p: Ethylene glycol maleic rosinate (meth)acrylate can be prepared from maleated rosin, ethylene glycol and (meth)acrylic acid according to Scheme 16 [ 85]. It can be applied in styrene-acrylate copolymers increasing their thermal stability [ 86], as well as in preparation of moleculary imprinted polymers for stationary phases used in high-performance liquid chromatography [ 85, 87].
